alert.note: Alert for Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued August 28 at 5:36PM EDT until August 30 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT WEDNESDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Coastal flooding. * WHERE...Middle Keys. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon, but especially during the morning high tides. * IMPACTS...Saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is expected. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of King tides and strong southerly breezes, will result in coastal flooding across the Middle Keys. Peak water levels will reach around 2 feet above mean high tide, or about a foot higher than Monday morning`s high tide.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be impassable. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
